# Introduction

`askMe` package provides associated model data and functions for cancer
classification.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(askme)
```

# Data from ExperimentHub

```{r result="asis", echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
kable(askme_models[,c("ModelID","PredictionLabelDescription")],
    caption="AskMe supported models")
```

# Cancer type classification

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tibble)
library(sesameData)
betas <- sesameDataGet("HM450.1.TCGA.PAAD")$betas
askme_cancertype(betas)
```

```{r}
sessionInfo()
```
